carboard: Recycle cardboard to reduce packaging waste and protect the environment.
paper: Reusing paper helps reduce tree felling and environmental sustainability.
plastic: Plastic is the most common type of waste found, it is important to sort it properly.
glass: Glass can be recycled without loss of quality, both for bottles and windows.
metal: Aluminum cans and other metals are easily recycled and have high economic value.
organic: Kitchen waste and food leftovers can be processed into useful compost.
